date.title: Bora Bora
date.description: Bora Bora is Tahiti's most famous island. Her beauty is unrivaled and her fame, unwavering. Bora Bora is one of the few places on earth that everyone hopes to witness in their lifetime—and once you see it, you are forever enamored.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: Maldives
date.description: This tropical nation in the Indian Ocean is made up of more than 1,000 coral islands. It’s home to some of the world’s most luxurious hotel resorts, with white sandy beaches, underwater villas and restaurants and bright blue waters.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: Paris
date.description: One of the most iconic cities in the world, Paris tops many people’s bucket lists. You’ll see so many famous landmarks here: the Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe, Notre Dame cathedral—the list is never-ending.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: Dubai
date.description: The high-flying city of the U.A.E, Dubai is one of the most glamorous destinations you’ll ever visit, and is particularly popular with Big 7 Travel readers.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: New York
date.description: New York is one of America’s most exciting states. With charming upstate scenery, world-class cuisine and culture and more things to do than you could fit in one lifetime. The city’s five boroughs all have special features.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: Tokyo, Japan
date.description: Visiting Tokyo is like visiting the future—flashing neon lights, incredible technology—yet there’s still a rich sense of culture and history.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
date.description: Rio de Janeiro has always been one of the most iconic cities in the world with instantly recognizable landscapes and landmarks.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: Hawaii
date.description: From the hustle and bustle of Oahu to the romance of Maui and off-the-beaten-path adventures on Lanai and Molokai. The Hawaiian Islands are pure paradise. Explore colorful canyons and waterfalls.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")

date.title: Ibiza, Spain
date.description: While you’ll have your fair share of techno club experiences, Ibiza is also one of the most beautiful Spanish islands, with a pretty Old Town and scenic beaches. Spend the day on the beach and the nights in legendary clubs.
date.confirm: return confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this item?")
